channel.title: Decorative lights
channel.description: Has anyone been frustrated that ALL of the light in satisfactory point down? How about some lights that can be pointed up towards building? I sure there's a modder out there that can make this happen.

item.title: Decorative lights
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

I think the ’ Light It Up’ mod used to have a light that did that.
But it was never updated after release 4.
I think the implementation of lights in that mod was better than what is included in the game now.

Read full topic
